title: Petition
context: §346-233 Petition. (a) A petition invoking the jurisdiction of the court under this part shall be entitled &ldquo;In the matter of the protection of ,&rdquo; and shall be verified. (b) The petition shall set forth with specificity the: (1) Reasons the person is considered to be a vulnerable adult; (2) Facts that bring the vulnerable adult within this part; (3) Name, birth date, sex, and residence address of the vulnerable adult; (4) Names and addresses of any living persons, or entities required to be notified pursuant to section 346-237; and (5) If appropriate, allegations describing any lack of capacity of the vulnerable adult. [L 1989, c 381, pt of §1; am L 1990, c 144, §1 and c 234, §9; am L 2008, c 154, §15]
